CustomField.description: A unique external ID text field which determines whether an Interaction will create a new Opportunity or edit an existing Opportunity. Built using the Contact’s 18-digit ID, Career, Term’s 158-digit ID, and Recruitment/Academic Interest’s 18-digit ID (if applicable) to ensure uniqueness and support of both a centralized and decentralized recruitment process. Set by the Interactions Processor.
CustomField.label: Opportunity Key
